document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclatural changes and lectotype designations in the seed-beetle genus Sennius Bridwell: with the synonymization of Megasennius Whitehead & Kingsolver (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Bruchinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nomenclatural changes and lectotype designations in the seed-beetle genus Sennius Bridwell: with the synonymization of Megasennius Whitehead & Kingsolver (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Bruchinae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remark. In his 1913 catalog, Pic misspelled the specific name
Bruchus lebasii Fåhraeus, 1839
as
Bruchus lebasi
, with subsequent papers propagating this error. Following the instructions of ICZN (1999, Article 33.4) this species is here treated as
Sennius lebasii
.
